pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gene Cluster Visualizations // Provides tools for plotting gene clusters and transcripts by importing data from GenBank, FASTA, and GFF files. It performs BLASTP and MUMmer alignments [Altschul et al. (1990) doi:10.1016/S0022-2836(05)80360-2; Delcher et al. (1999) doi:10.1093/nar/27.11.2369] and displays results on gene arrow maps. Extensive customization options are available, including legends, labels, annotations, scales, colors, tooltips, and more.
